name: openfin-layouts
description: Client library for the OpenFin Layouts service

scripts.clean: gts clean && rm -rf dist && echo 'Deleted dist'
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:wp" "npm run serve"
scripts.build: npm run fix && npm run compile && webpack --mode development
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run compile && webpack --mode production
scripts.prepare: tsc --outDir module_dist src/SnapAndDock/Client/main.ts --lib DOM,ES6 --declaration --target ES2017 --module commonjs
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run demo
scripts.demo: concurrently "npm run serve" "npm run build && openfin -l -c http://localhost:1337/SnapDockDemo/app.json"
